casebody.data:
IN RE LILYANA P. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 25, 2017

David J. Reich, in support of the petition.

Daniel M. Salton, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent mother for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 708, 152 A.3d 99 (2016), is denied.
